蓭字的基本解释

蓭
ān
古同“庵”。

蓭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ān］
［《廣韻》烏含切，平覃，影。］
［《廣韻》烏合切，入合，影。］
亦作“厂2”。亦作“广2”。同“菴1”。亦作“蓭1”。
(1)圆顶草屋。
(2)旧时文人多用以作字号或书斋名。
(3)寺院。多指尼姑所居。
[②]［yǎn］
通“奄1”。
忽然。

蓭字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蓭； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1052第15
【集韻】同庵。【類篇】圓屋曰蓭。　又作菴。【蜀志·裴松之註】亮敕軍中臥旗息鼓，不得妄出菴幔。

蓭字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
蓭字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Xiao
ān
Gu Tong "an".

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [ān]
["Guangyun" Wu Hanqie, Pingtan, Shadow. ]
["Guangyun" Wuhe cut, joined together, photo. ]
Also known as "Factory 2". Also known as "Guang 2". Same as "An 1". Also known as "蓭1".
(1) Dome houses.
(2) In the old days, literati mostly used it as a font size or study name.
(3) The monastery. Mostly refers to where the nun lives.
[②]［yǎn］
Same as "Am 1".
suddenly.

[Ji Yun] Tongan. 【Classes】The round house is called Jiao.　Zuoan again. [Shu Zhi·Pei Song's Note] Lie down in the light of the imperial army, and must not rush out of the mantle.
